column11: just to amuse himself.One day old Jim was in the yard behind the engine-house
column12: and a man went out to catch him
column13: and lead him in. But he rushed and pranced around the yard
column14: and would not be caught. Then the man set out to drive him in; and what do you think Jim did?Instead of going in at the open door
column16: and went in at the open window
column18: or hurting himself in the least. No one who saw the window would believe that such a great horse could possibly have gone through it.
